DOC.brief_summary: A study in healthy males and females to see if a high single dose of TA-8995 has an effect on the ECG QTcF interval.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Electrocardiographic Effects of TA-8995
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or females of nonchild bearing potential Receiving any other drug therapy Clinically significant medical history Abnormal ECGs or vital signs
